label: Kayaks and Canoes
description: Watercraft for recreational and fishing purposes.
intents: Find kayaks and canoes for sale

subcategories.label: Sit-on-top Kayaks
subcategories.description: Kayaks with an open cockpit and no enclosed space.

subcategories.label: Touring and Sea Kayaks
subcategories.description: Kayaks designed for long-distance travel on open water.

subcategories.label: Folding and Inflatable Boats
subcategories.description: Kayaks and canoes that can be easily transported and stored.

subcategories.label: Whitewater Kayaking
subcategories.description: Kayaking on fast-moving water with rapids and obstacles.
